name: Sweety Kitty 2
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2176270/Miss_Kawaii_2/
You will be able to restore 15 different pictures of beautiful girls.
Each picture is split into different bricks that you can rotate with the left and right mouse button
The first 5 images slit into 20 different bricks
The second 5 split into 30 different bricks
The last 5 split into 80 different bricks
This game was created to help you relax and clear your mind, so relax and enjoy)
.
